name: FloodWarningsAPI
author: Jonathan SMITH

sections.description: Integrates with ShortHill FloodAlert API to provide up-to-the-minute UK Environment Agency Flood Alerts included in your WordPress-based website. Creates a Custom Post Type called ‘flood_warning’ which can be integrated into your website via WP queries or provided Widgets.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload fw_api.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. See our online documentation available here (http://www.jmtg.co.uk/wordpress-plugins/floodwarningsapi)
sections.faq:
None currently submitted

Will appear here when required

short_description: Integrate UK Environment Agency Flood Alerts into your WordPress site.
description: Integrates with ShortHill FloodAlert API to provide up-to-the-minute UK Environment Agency Flood Alerts included in your WordPress-based website. Creates a Custom Post Type called ‘flood_warning’ which can be integrated into your website via WP queries or provided Widgets.
